title: Can you play normal during today's ranked service maintenance?

replies.body: Most games modes will be available unless an announcement is made for any downtime.  We'll provide updates for any disabled queues on our [server status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)page.  Hope that helps!
If you're referring to Patch 6.15, yes most players can play normally. If you experience any issues, do not hesitate to contact us.
